parameters.date: a date for when a new minimum wage was introduced

description:
Description
A data set on the various federal minimum wage rates.
title: History of Federal Minimum Wage Rates Under the Fair Labor Standards Act, 1938-2009
reference:
Data come from the Department of Labor. Wages are taken from wage adjustments
from the 1938 act.
format: A data frame with 23 observations on the following 5 variables.
